item.title: Reset With price
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

Superman is right. But you should make it to were the person who wants to reset there strength knows that it costs 5m to do so. So add 2 commands. 1 that you put on the command list that simply sends a message saying “Type ::resetmystrength to reset your strength. It will cost 5m gold.” Heres the code for that:

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("resetmystrength")) {
				c.sendMessage("Type ::resetstrength to reset your strength it will cost 5m gold");
			}

Now the ::resetstrength will be the same as what imsuperman05 said.

Not trying to rip off your answer, imsuperman05. Just helping moparscape have better servers because I’m in a really good mood and I can’t think of anything to add to my server that I’m working on.

Read full topic

item.title: Reset With price
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

you were close eye.

[code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“resetstrength”)) {
if (c.inWild())
return;
for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) {
c.sendMessage(“Please take all your armour and weapons off before using this command.”);
return;
}
}
try {
if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 5000000)) {
int skill = 2;
int level = 1;
c.playerXP[skill] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5;
c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill);
c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 5000000);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 5m to use this command.”);
}
} catch (Exception e){

			}
		}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Reset With price
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

When i added it the command would look like:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("resetstrength")) { if (c.inWild()) return; for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("Please take all your armour and weapons off before using this command."); return; } } try { if(c.hasItem(995, 5000000) { int skill = 2; int level = 1; c.playerXP[skill] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill); c.removeItem(995, 5000000); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 5m to use this command."); } } catch (Exception e){} }

But im getting errors

item.title: Reset With price
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

smitman5110:

c.sendmessage(“Please give me 5m or fuckin die!”);

How the fuck was that helpful…[quote=“RsInFecTion, post:1, topic:414306”]Well Basicly I have this command

[quote]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“resetstrength”)) {
if (c.inWild())
return;
for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) {
c.sendMessage(“Please take all your armour and weapons off before using this command.”);
return;
}
}
try {
int skill = 2;
int level = 1;
c.playerXP[skill] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5;
c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill);
} catch (Exception e){}
}[/quote]

And I was wondering how to make it so that you need 5m to do the command.
Thanks and will Rep++[/quote]
Not exact methods, but use something like this (I don’t use PI):

try { if(c.hasItem(995, 5000000) { int skill = 2; int level = 1; c.playerXP[skill] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill); c.removeItem(995, 5000000); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 5m to use this command."); } } catch (Exception e){}
